arStrings.szText:
You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to enemies below {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|%|]{/c} Life.

While enemies are affected by more Damage Over Time than their total Life, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to them.
